title: Focus on the Positive with 365 Daily Affirmations
text:
By Phylameana lila Desy Updated February 15, 2017 . 
Select affirmations to help you focus on the positive through out the year. It is best to use affirmations on a daily basis. But at the very least I suggest that you dedicate the first day each month to an affirmation reboot. Banish any negative thinking and nourish the positive. When you begin using affirmations on a regular basis you will easily recognize the power of affirmations . 
Affirmations are a wonder self growth tool and helps to keep your intentions succinct and bathed in a positive light. January Affirmation 
New Year Affirmation Today I set goals I know I can reach. Today is the first day of the rest of my life. The goals I set today for myself will help me in the days to come. My intentions are pure and powerful, February Affirmation 
Valentine's Day Affirmation I believe in a Loving Presence that manifests through me and in everything around me. I am LOVED! March Affirmation 
A Leprechaun's Affirmation Good luck follows me wherever I go. Today and everyday I visualize rainbows in the skies and a pot full of golden opportunities. I am truly blessed! Hannah Bichay/The Image Bank/Getty Images April Affirmations 
April Showers Affirmation I am showered with love and affection. Every rain drop that falls on my head is a gift that nourishes my being. I weather all storm effectively and bravely. May Affirmations 
May Affirmation I am the gardener who has nurtured my body and soul with essential nutrients and a healthy lifestyle. Much like the saying "April Showers Bring May Flowers" I am enjoying the fruits of my own care taking. Everything in my life is coming up daisies! June Affirmations 
Graduate Affirmation I acknowledge my education and put it to good use. I anticipate a future of accomplishment, prosperity, and wisdom. My future begins today! July Affirmations 
My life is like a day at the beach! I love my life. August Affirmations 
Back-to-School Affirmation I am an intelligent person. I enjoy learning in the classroom. Education is a gift that I value. Books are my friends. September Affirmations 
I open my hands and welcome prosperity into my life. Abundance comes to me easily. October Affirmations 
Seasonal Affirmation I light up the world around me with a smile on my face. I glow with happiness from the inside out. November Affirmations 
Thanksgiving Affirmation I am blessed with a loving family and caring friends. My belly is filled with abundant foods and drink. Feeling grateful and expressing gratitude is an important part of my life. Goodness is plentiful. December Affirmations 
Holiday Affirmation I embrace the holiday season with joy and an open heart. I look at this time of year through the eyes of a child full of excitement. I gift others with kindness and a sincere smile. I feel at peace and view my life as the miracle that it is.
